actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from ACIR, HHS, OMB, Justice.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Information and Individual Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Information and Individual Rights

official_title: A bill to require public disclosure by certain recipients of Federal funds of information required to be kept by such recipients as a condition of receiving such funds.

summary.text: Requires recipients of Federal grants made for other than personal use to allow the public to inspect any disbursement records the recipient is required to keep as a condition for receiving such grant. Exempts from disclosure specified information, including classified information, trade secrets, and personnel and medical files.

titles.title: A bill to require public disclosure by certain recipients of Federal funds of information required to be kept by such recipients as a condition of receiving such funds.
